intent_atoms.description: Integrate DS.Indicator component into ISOInspectorApp views to provide compact visual status cues alongside existing badges.
Indicator component must be added in ParseTreeDetailView.swift at lines 143-179 with size .small and spacing DS.Spacing.s, including accessibility label and tooltip.
Indicator component must be added in ParseTreeOutlineView.swift at lines 550-654 with size .mini and spacing DS.Spacing.xs, including accessibility label and tooltip.
Both indicators use descriptorBadgeLevel() helper to map status levels to BadgeLevel equivalents (info, warning, error, success).
All @todo #I1.1 markers are removed from the source files.
Indicator component must not increase row height or alter layout beyond specified spacing.
Accessibility labels and tooltips must be fully configured for VoiceOver support.
Use existing FoundationUI Indicator component instead of creating a new one, reusing design tokens DS.Spacing.s/xs.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeDetailView Metadata Status Row
functional_units.description: Displays metadata rows in the parse tree detail view with a small DS.Indicator dot and a ParseTreeStatusBadge, providing compact visual status cues, accessibility labels, and tooltips.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeOutlineView Tree Node Status
functional_units.description: Shows tree nodes in the parse tree outline view with a mini DS.Indicator dot next to a ParseTreeStatusBadge, offering ultra-compact status indicators, minimal spacing, accessibility support, and tooltips.
